key_events: Strong Q4 earnings beat (+15% vs expectations)

sources.title: Company X beats Q4 earnings expectations

sizing.rationale: Strong fundamentals (ROE: 28%, revenue growth: 18% YoY) combined with bullish technical setup (breakout above $150 resistance with RSI at 65) justify a moderate 15% position size. Kelly Criterion suggests ~18%, but we reduce to 15% for risk management.

rationale: Based on strong earnings beat (+15% vs expectations), bullish technical breakout above $150 resistance with cup-and-handle pattern confirmation, and favorable news sentiment (score: 1.5), we recommend BUY with 15% position size. The company shows excellent fundamentals (ROE: 28%, revenue growth: 18%) and is currently undervalued. Technical indicators support entry: RSI at 65 (not overbought), MACD showing bullish crossover, and price above all major moving averages. Stop loss at $145 (-3.3%) protects against false breakout, while take profit at $165 (+10%) targets next resistance level. Risk/reward ratio of 3:1 is favorable.

sources.description: Q4 2025 earnings beat by 15%, EPS $3.45 vs $3.00 expected
Bullish MACD crossover with histogram increasing
P/E ratio (22.5) below sector average (28.0), indicating undervaluation
Upgraded to 'Buy' by Goldman Sachs, price target raised to $170
